name: Navarun !
description:
Escape endless dungeons! Run for your life!

Help Navarin find back his friend Bourguignon in this pixel art-based game!

Dungeon Acolytes is a small indie studio and Navarun is its first game.This game took us nearly 2 months to complete. It's a sequel to DoggoKnight, our very first try in game dev.

Control :

Z Q S D for moving

E action

ECHAP for pause

SHIFT for Walk

ALT F4 for quitting the game w/ style

Team :

Programming and Art: Siieg

Sound design and Music: Robin FREVILLE / Frerobin

Communication: Pierre GAUVRIT / Pebble 

OST!

Do not hesitate to share your progression and feedback with us. Enjoy!

Follow us on our social networks!
